mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "DeadlineFinishDate", CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate) + #{accountDelayTerm} AND TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "SendFlag", TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate), -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "StartDate" FROM act_deadline DL WHERE DL.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} ORDER BY DL.DeadlineID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT count(ReleaseUserCode) as 'Cnt', ReleaseUserCode, ACR.CardNo, ReleaseDate, ReturnDate FROM act_card_receipt as ACR INNER JOIN act_corp_card_return as ACCR ON ACR.CardNo = ACCR.CardNo WHERE 1=1
AND CASE WHEN ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' THEN ACR.ApproveDate ELSE ACR.UseDate END >= REPLACE(#{approveDateS},'.','')
AND CASE WHEN ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' THEN ACR.ApproveDate ELSE ACR.UseDate END <= REPLACE(#{approveDateE},'.','')
AND ACR.CardNo LIKE '%' || #{cardNo} || '%'
AND ACCR.ReleaseDate < ACR.UseDate AND ACCR.ReturnDate > ACR.UseDate GROUP BY OwnerUserCode, ACR.CardNo, ReleaseDate, ReturnDate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT count(ReleaseUserCode) as 'Cnt', ReleaseUserCode, ACR.CardNo, ReleaseDate, ReturnDate FROM act_card_receipt AS ACR INNER JOIN act_corp_card_return AS ACCR ON ACR.CardNo = ACCR.CardNo WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY OwnerUserCode, ACR.CardNo, ReleaseDate, ReturnDate ) AS ReturnCard INNER JOIN act_card_receipt AS ACRR ON ReturnCard.CardNo = ACRR.CardNo WHERE 1=1
AND CASE WHEN ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' THEN ACR.ApproveDate ELSE ACR.UseDate END >= REPLACE(#{approveDateS},'.','')
AND CASE WHEN ACR.InfoIndex = 'A' THEN ACR.ApproveDate ELSE ACR.UseDate END <= REPLACE(#{approveDateE},'.','')
AND ACR.CardNo LIKE '%' || #{cardNo} || '%'
AND ReturnCard.ReleaseDate < ACRR.UseDate AND ReturnCard.ReturnDate > ACRR.UseDate

SELECT ACI.TaxInvoiceID , ACI.CONVERSATION_ID , ACI.InvoicerCorpName , ACI.TotalAmount , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ACI.WriteDate),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS WriteDate
, ACI.InvoiceeContactName1 AS ReceiversName , ACI.InvoiceeEmail1 AS ReceiversCode
, USR.DisplayName AS ReceiversName , USR.UserCode AS ReceiversCode
, MAGR.DisplayName AS ReceiversName , MAGR.UserCode AS ReceiversCode
FROM act_taxinvoice ACI
JOIN sys_object_user USR ON ACI.TossUserCode = USR.UserCode
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.TaxMailAddress , UR.DisplayName , UR.MailAddress , UR.UserCode FROM act_manager A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user UR ON A.ManagerUserCode = UR.UserCode UNION SELECT SOU.MailAddress , SOU.DisplayName , SOU.MailAddress , SOU.UserCode FROM sys_object_user SOU WHERE NVL(SOU.MailAddress,'') != '' ) MAGR ON ACI.InvoiceeEmail1 = MAGR.TaxMailAddress
WHERE
#{item}
1=2
ORDER BY
ACI.InvoiceeEmail1
USR.UserCode
MAGR.UserCode
